title: Ready to go Home in Tacoma. 3 Beds, 2 Baths
posting_body: Located in Lakewood, this 3-bd home is close to everything.
With mid-century styling, updates in the the baths & kitchen, this gem is one you don't want to miss.
You will love the family room off the kitchen where everyone will gather for those memorable occasions.
So nice to have a formal LR and DR to do the big entertaining.
Air conditioning makes the home comfortable & the sunroom makes the winters tolerable.
All bedrooms are generous in size & separate from the living areas.
The private backyard will give you a great place to relax or putz around.
The garage has built-ins, a workshop AND plenty of room for two cars.
Close to freeway access, shopping and medical services.
